attributes.additional_details:
Farmers should get a income for working hard on growing goods in the UK.


Why should they get a farmers income

*Because if the farmers had a reasonable income from the government the farmers could sell food cheaper so that food prices can be lowered

*Food is the back bone of this country everyone needs to eat and with these food prices being so high we cannot each healthy fresh foods making people become sick and unhealthy.

*There are so many reasons why farmers should be supported it will help the economy by maybe exporting goods and long term a steady income to the government.
